snippet.title: The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story | Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
From Digital Sun, creators of Moonlighter, comes The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story™. In this indie 2D pixel action RPG set in the League of Legends universe, play as Sylas, a spell-stealing mage now freed from his captivity at the hands of the oppressive Mageseekers. Wield the chains that once bound you and bring Demacia to its reckoning.

Coming soon to Nintendo Switch, Playstation, Xbox, GOG, Steam, and Epic Games.

Stay up to date:
Twitter (@RiotForge)
Facebook (@RiotForge)
Instagram (@RiotForge)

Learn more about The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story: https://themageseeker.com 
Learn more about Digital Sun: https://www.digitalsungames.com/ 
Learn more about Riot Forge: https://riotforgegames.com/
